data.title: Nikita Ryzhov, Giuseppe Medici, and Andrei Gromyko
data.meta_description: USSR Foreign Minister Andrei Gromyko (born 1909) during a meets with the Foreign Minister of Italy and Giuseppe Medici (center) during his visit to the USSR. On the left - Nikita Ryzhov, USSR ambassador to Italy.
data.text:
USSR Foreign Minister Andrei Gromyko (born 1909) during a meets with the Foreign Minister of Italy and Giuseppe Medici (center) during his visit to the USSR. On the left - Nikita Ryzhov, USSR ambassador to Italy.
